channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Route 41 - tree down, 25th November
item.description:
The is a tree partially blocking route 41. It is not fully down but lying at roughly head height across the path.

item.title: Every time there is rain water runs on Old Road from Sunset Lane and then creates a large pool at the top of Southam Lane outside the house named Springbank on Old Road, Southam. This has been reported before, but no action taken. When cold weather comes, this will form ice and the treacherous at a busy road junction,, 24th November
item.description:
Outside Springbank, Old Road, Southam.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains unable to cope with flash flooding, 24th November
item.description:
The drains indicated in the location on the map have insufficient capacity to manage the flash flooding. This has resulted in the road becoming impassable and is occurring on an increasingly regular basis.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmiths Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch fallen o to garden path, 24th November
item.description:
45 Mendip Road Cheltenham GL52 5EB. Large and heavy branch has fallen this morning into my garden path. I have moved it onto the grass so it is not blocking exit and entrance to property but needs removing. Furthermore there ar still broken branches hanging dangerously over my garden which need attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Mendip Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road drains are blocked outside number 22,16 Cheltenham Rd Winchcombe and drains in road outside 86/88 Gloucester Street Winchcombe, 24th November
item.description:
Drains outside 16, 22 Cheltenham Road Winchcombe and drains outside 86/88 Gloucester Street Winchcombe No water can get down these drains causing it to flood down the roads. The issue has been present for several months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
